# This .gitignore file should be placed at the root of your Unity project directory

# Ignore temporary files
[Tt]emp/
[Oo]bj/
[Bb]uild/
[Ll]ogs/

# Ignore project settings
[Ll]ibrary/
[Mm]emoryCaptures/
[Ss]ysInfo.txt

# Ignore crash reports
[Dd]ump/ 
[Oo]utput_log.txt

# Ignore autogenerated files
ExportedObj/
.consulo/
*.pidb
*.suo
*.user
*.userprefs
*.csproj
*.unityproj
*.booproj
*.svd
*.pdb
*.mdb
*.opendb
*.VC.db

# Rider
.idea/

# Visual Studio
.vscode/
.vs/

# OSX
.DS_Store

# Logs
*.log

# Builds
*.apk
*.aab
*.xcodeproj

# Other
.DS_Store
*.swp
